name: Hazel Spectator Round One: A Mass of Teeth and Fairy Glass
name_original: Hazel Spectator Round One: A Mass of Teeth and Fairy Glass
description:
This game is a Spectator Entry for an OCT called DreamCatcher. The plotline is that people have been falling into a coma and waking up in a magical place called DreamCatcher HQ. There is only one way out and that's to compete in a tournament for a failsafe. 

Hazel isn't interested in saving herself or competing with anyone. She ended up in a hospital ward under near constant supervision after becoming a risk to herself. The hospital she is in ends up being attacked by a monster named "Head Heads".

 Can she survive when she already feels she has no reason to live?

Hazel is a mentally ill transgender fairy. Her transgender status doesn't really come up at all in this game but it is worth noting that she is out and takes hormones.
